description: Surrogate primary key uniquely identifying this estimated miscellaneous cost record.
Reference to the work order asset procedure line this estimated miscellaneous cost is associated with.
Flag indicating whether this miscellaneous cost line has been fully applied/closed (e.g., 0 = no, 1 = yes; confirm with SME).
Identifier of the miscellaneous cost type or charge being estimated for this procedure line (likely a lookup to a cost code; confirm with SME).
Planned number of units for this miscellaneous cost item.
Planned cost per unit for this item, in the work orderâ€™s currency.
Quantity still outstanding for this miscellaneous cost item, based on progress or completion.
System timestamp when this record was last updated.
Application/user-facing timestamp of the last update (likely separate from system timestamp; confirm with SME).
Identifier of the user or process that created this record.
Timestamp when the creating user or process created this record.
Identifier of the user or process that last modified this record.
Timestamp when the modifying user or process last updated this record.
